isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - ASSEMBLE - CYLINDER HEAD

svcproc.title: CYLINDER HEAD
svcproc.para: Place the cylinder head gasket (Item 19) and cylinder head on the compressor crankcase and install the six cylinder head capscrews. If the cylinder head gasket has a bead on one side, install the gasket on the crankcase with the beaded side up. Snug the cylinder head capscrews prior to tightening the capscrews to 440 to 500 in-lbs. (49.711 to 56.490 N•m) in a cross pattern. Then re-tighten the unloader cover capscrews to 175 to 225 in-lbs. (19.741 to 25.420 N•m).
